name: PostCat
description:
Story (Yes, there is one)

Meow ! The PostCat must deliver all it’s packages. But there is a small problem. He really is careless and he might get hurt… Even worse : the packages wouldn’t be delivered at all. What a shame ! 

Your role is to help him to avoid all the traps from the post office to peoples’ house.

How to play

Click on items you want to drop on PostCat’s path and land them on the floor in order to help him brave the dangers ! It’s that “simple”  You can also try to cat(ch) the envelopes as an additional challenge !

Don’t worry, there is a tutorial to guide you 

Credits
  • Engine : Godot
  • Graphics : Aseprite
  • Music : Kenney assets (1&3)
  • Sound effects : Bfxr
